User Story: As a new user, I want to register for an account so I can use the app.
As an existing user, I want to log in to my account to access my conversations.
As a logged-in user, I want the app to remember me on my next visit.
As a logged-in user, I want to be able to log out.
As a user, I want to see a welcome message when I open a new chat.
As a user, I want to type a message in an input box and send it by pressing a button or Enter.
As a user, I want to see my message and the AI's response displayed in the chat window.
As a user, I want to see a loading indicator while the AI is generating a response.
As a user, I want to switch between a light and dark theme to suit my preference.
As a user, I want to see a history of my previous conversations.
As a user, I want to search my chat history.
As a user, I want to pin important chats to the top of my history.
As a user on a mobile device, I want the layout to adapt to my smaller screen.
